trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Troy
There were no other sightings in Troy on or around November 2nd 2010
divs: sighting detailsobject was about 10000 feet up and appx 300 yrds diameter. it was heading northbound at a slow speed no sound was evident. jt was triangle shaped flashing red ljght in the center and 2 non blinking white lights on each side .what got my attention, was the 3 rows of lights in front looked like windows. being a former p.i i noticed the extreme size of it. we have nothing that big. was movjng north toward plattsburg afb. there were other aircraft in the sky as albany jnt airport is about 30 miles south so it was easy to campare size and distance sighting was apprx 9 mins. before it flew out of sight i took pics. but they came out to dark. this area is a hotspot as many sightings have occured over the last ten years\ thank you for your time .
Summary: looked toward eastern sky saw triangle shaped object heading north
